Senior Android Developer in Sunny Barcelona

Looking for the right Job or Career? Are you passionate about #Android Apps? letgo is a revolution in marketplaces: it's mobile, easy to use and local. Our goal is to make selling and buying from people nearby a breeze! We're looking for people who are as passionate as we are and, just as importantly, who embrace constant change and innovation to join our team of creative, hard-working professionals.

If you join our Android team you will work with the following technologies:

• RxJava • Dagger 2 • Retrofit • JUnit, Mockito and Espresso

What we’re looking for:

• At least 3 years of experience programming with Android • Solid architecture knowledge • Ability to write clean, easy-to-read code • Willing to program as part of a team (not just alone) • Experience in delivering apps to millions • Love delightful interfaces, and able to code them to render in less than 16ms • Understand why you should use enums (or not) • Experience with CI systems (Jenkins, CircleCI)

More info here: http://buff.ly/2dp27un

Thank you!
